Name: Paid in Full
Title: Stealthy Extraction
Desc: Remember this for so long as you live: You know who it is you owe, and you know when you must pay.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Fatui Pyro Agent at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Paid in Full
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2301]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2301] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S23012]</color> once.
When your $[A2301], who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123012]</color>, it will have the following effects:
Starting $[K3] +1, the $[K100] the attached character deals will be converted to $[K103].
(You must have $[A2301] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C123012.Desc: The character to which this is attached takes -1 DMG and deals +1 DMG.\n$[K3]: 3\nThe character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K103].
